sqlMap.select: select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2, (SELECT B.VEHICLE_VIN,B.NO_UP_NUM,B.NO_DOWN_NUM,B.NOFIX_UP_NUM,B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM, (CASE WHEN B.NO_UP_NUM =0 AND B.NO_DOWN_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_UP_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM =0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS FILTER FROM (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN, SUM(A.NO_UP_NUM) NO_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NO_DOWN_NUM) NO_DOWN_NUM, SUM(A.NOFIX_UP_NUM) NOFIX_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T A
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
A.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY A.VEHICLE_VIN )B ) T1 WHERE T2.VEHICLE_VIN = T1.VEHICLE_VIN(+)
T2.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) )
T2.VEHICLE_LN LIKE '%' || #vehicle_ln# ||'%' ESCAPE '\'
T1.FILTER = 1
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T XT WHERE XT.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN AND XT.VALID_FLAG = '0')

SELECT T2.VEHICLE_LN,T2.VEHICLE_VIN,T2.SHORT_NAME, (case when T1.NO_UP_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NO_UP_NUM end) NO_UP_NUM, (case when T1.NO_DOWN_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NO_DOWN_NUM end) NO_DOWN_NUM, (case when T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM end) NOFIX_UP_NUM, (case when T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM end) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM
FROM CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2, (SELECT B.VEHICLE_VIN,B.NO_UP_NUM,B.NO_DOWN_NUM,B.NOFIX_UP_NUM,B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM, (CASE WHEN B.NO_UP_NUM =0 AND B.NO_DOWN_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_UP_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM =0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS FILTER FROM (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN, SUM(A.NO_UP_NUM) NO_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NO_DOWN_NUM) NO_DOWN_NUM, SUM(A.NOFIX_UP_NUM) NOFIX_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T A
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
A.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY A.VEHICLE_VIN )B ) T1 WHERE T2.VEHICLE_VIN = T1.VEHICLE_VIN(+)
T2.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) )
T2.VEHICLE_LN LIKE '%' || #vehicle_ln# ||'%' ESCAPE '\'
T1.FILTER = 1
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T XT WHERE XT.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN AND XT.VALID_FLAG = '0')
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT '总计' VEHICLE_LN,'' VEHICLE_VIN,'' SHORT_NAME, ( case when sum(T1.NO_UP_NUM) is null then 0 else sum(T1.NO_UP_NUM) end ) NO_UP_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NO_DOWN_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NO_DOWN_NUM) end ) NO_DOWN_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM) end ) NOFIX_UP_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) end ) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T T1,CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2 WHERE T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN
T2.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) )
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T XT WHERE XT.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN AND XT.VALID_FLAG = '0')
T2.VEHICLE_LN LIKE '%' || #vehicle_ln# ||'%' ESCAPE '\'
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
T1.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
T1.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T T1, CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T T4, (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN,A.VEHICLE_LN,A.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND A.DEVICE_TYPE = '0') T6 WHERE T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T6.VEHICLE_VIN AND T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID = T4.ALARM_TYPE_ID AND T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL
T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID in ($alarm_type_id$)
T1.VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#
T6.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) )
T6.VEHICLE_LN LIKE '%' || #vehicle_ln# ||'%' ESCAPE '\'
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T XT WHERE XT.VEHICLE_VIN = T6.VEHICLE_VIN AND XT.VALID_FLAG = '0')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TO_DATE(#begTime#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(#endTime#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD')-1,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')

SELECT T2.STU_NAME,T2.STU_SCHOOL,T2.STU_CLASS, T3.SITE_NAME,T5.ROUTE_NAME,T6.VEHICLE_LN, TO_CHAR(T1.TERMINAL_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') TERMINAL_TIME,T4.ALARM_TYPE_NAME, T7.DRIVER_NAME, T8.SICHEN_NAME FROM CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T T1, (SELECT A.STU_ID, A.STU_NAME,A.STU_SCHOOL,A.STU_CLASS FROM CLW_XC_STUDENT_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T2, (SELECT A.SITE_ID,A.SITE_NAME FROM CLW_XC_SITE_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T3, CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T T4, (SELECT A.ROUTE_ID,A.ROUTE_NAME FROM CLW_XC_ROUTE_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T5, (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN,A.VEHICLE_LN,A.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND A.DEVICE_TYPE = '0') T6, CLW_YW_DRIVER_T T7, CLW_XC_SICHEN_T T8 WHERE T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T6.VEHICLE_VIN AND T1.STU_ID = T2.STU_ID(+) AND T1.SITE_ID = T3.SITE_ID(+) AND T1.ROUTE_ID = T5.ROUTE_ID(+) AND T1.DRIVER_ID = T7.DRIVER_ID(+) AND T1.SICHEN_ID = T8.SICHEN_ID(+) AND T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID = T4.ALARM_TYPE_ID AND T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL
T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID in ($alarm_type_id$)
T1.VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#
T6.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #user_organization_id#) )
T6.VEHICLE_LN LIKE '%' || #vehicle_ln# ||'%' ESCAPE '\'
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T XT WHERE XT.VEHICLE_VIN = T6.VEHICLE_VIN AND XT.VALID_FLAG = '0')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TO_DATE(#begTime#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(#endTime#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
AND T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD')-1,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2, (SELECT B.VEHICLE_VIN,B.NO_UP_NUM,B.NO_DOWN_NUM,B.NOFIX_UP_NUM,B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM, (CASE WHEN B.NO_UP_NUM =0 AND B.NO_DOWN_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_UP_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM =0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS FILTER FROM (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN, SUM(A.NO_UP_NUM) NO_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NO_DOWN_NUM) NO_DOWN_NUM, SUM(A.NOFIX_UP_NUM) NOFIX_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T A
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
A.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY A.VEHICLE_VIN )B ) T1 WHERE T2.VEHICLE_VIN = T1.VEHICLE_VIN(+)
T2.VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#
T1.FILTER = 1

SELECT T2.VEHICLE_LN,T2.VEHICLE_VIN,T2.SHORT_NAME, (case when T1.NO_UP_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NO_UP_NUM end) NO_UP_NUM, (case when T1.NO_DOWN_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NO_DOWN_NUM end) NO_DOWN_NUM, (case when T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM end) NOFIX_UP_NUM, (case when T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM is null then 0 else T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM end) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM
FROM CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2, (SELECT B.VEHICLE_VIN,B.NO_UP_NUM,B.NO_DOWN_NUM,B.NOFIX_UP_NUM,B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM, (CASE WHEN B.NO_UP_NUM =0 AND B.NO_DOWN_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_UP_NUM=0 AND B.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM =0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS FILTER FROM (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN, SUM(A.NO_UP_NUM) NO_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NO_DOWN_NUM) NO_DOWN_NUM, SUM(A.NOFIX_UP_NUM) NOFIX_UP_NUM,SUM(A.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T A
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
A.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
A.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
A.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY A.VEHICLE_VIN )B ) T1 WHERE T2.VEHICLE_VIN = T1.VEHICLE_VIN(+)
T2.VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#
T1.FILTER = 1
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT '总计' VEHICLE_LN,'' VEHICLE_VIN,'' SHORT_NAME, ( case when sum(T1.NO_UP_NUM) is null then 0 else sum(T1.NO_UP_NUM) end ) NO_UP_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NO_DOWN_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NO_DOWN_NUM) end ) NO_DOWN_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NOFIX_UP_NUM) end ) NOFIX_UP_NUM, ( case when SUM(T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) is null then 0 else SUM(T1.NOFIX_DOWN_NUM) end ) NOFIX_DOWN_NUM FROM CLW_XC_CL_STATISTICS_T T1,CLW_JC_VEHICLE_BASEINFO_VI T2 WHERE T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN
T2.VEHICLE_VIN = #VIN#
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') and sysdate
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') and last_day(sysdate)
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'Q'),2))
T1.BUSINESS_DAY between TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'Y') and last_day(add_months(TRUNC(sysdate,'Y'),11))
T1.BUSINESS_DAY >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
T1.BUSINESS_DAY <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
